Invocation Name: life hack of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Actually Our Life is very simple n beautiful. But we have made it very complex.
There are so many things in our daily life we struggle. We need simple solution for simple problem. That problem can be related to our mental health to our daily activities like removing stain from cloths…….and so on. After all, it's sometimes the simplest things in life that matter the most.

Skill’s Purpose:
‘Life Hack of the Day’ gives simple, easy tips to improve your day-today life. They are fun tips that make your life run a little bit more smoothly. It cultivates a healthier mindset as well as it increases your productivity and efficiency. It will make your life easy.

Features:
“Just one positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.” 

‘Life Hack of the Day' provides amazing inspirational/motivational thoughts from scholars around the world, scholars belonging to absolutely different backgrounds (spiritual gurus, techies, philosophers, scientists, movie personalities, politicians, authors, sportsmen, musicians, businessmen, leaders, social workers and so on). 

It also tells you the simple solution for small problems that can help you save time with some aspect of your life. 

How it works:

Just say, “Alexa, open Life Hack of the day” or “Alexa, load Life Hack of the day” or “Alexa, start life hack of the day”, etc. Each day it will have an entirely new Life Hack. Skill also tells you the count of life hack listened so far.

To some extent, this skill gives solution to simple problem. At the same time it tells you how to balance your mental health, which is so vital. Because ultimately ‘You are what you think’. 

It helps you to improve your life in many areas such as family, relation, happiness, motivation, mental peace.

So, use this Amazon Alexa skill - ‘Life Hack of the Day', which will tell you how to improve your life, one life hack at a time.
